pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, October 4, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, October 4, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario  

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Families of Sisters in Spirit Vigil and deliver brief remarks.

Front lawn of Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

7:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Mid-Autumn Festival celebration and will deliver remarks.

Room 325
Wellington Building
180 Wellington Street

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
